name: BAT INTO HELL
description:
Journey into the other side to vanquish the evil spirits within.

This game was made for the Geojam. Thanks to Icoso for hosting it!

I want to thank my playtesters: Captain Cookie, Baron Auldone, DerpyDino35, Cattycode9, Jeffyboi,  Smelly Lemonade and TherRealMelon27.

I also want to thank SketchyLogic for the Music: NES Shooter Music (5 tracks, 3 jingles) | OpenGameArt.org

Check out my YouTube channel : Hallowd Games - YouTube

Twitch Channel:HallowdPlays - Twitch

Discord Server:https://discord.gg/kzesbzyNjy

And other games on Itch.

If you get stuck on any bosses here's a Game Walkthrough:Bat into Hell Boss Walkthrough. GeoJam. - YouTube
